title.narrative: Financing Public Private Partnerships (PPPs) in Infrastructure through Support to the India Infrastructure Finance Company Ltd

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to strengthen IIFCL’s capacity for infrastructure PPP financing through piloting new instruments and implementation approaches.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Para 14 of amendment letter | Description :IIFCL undertakes to incorporate/integrate the provisions of theAddendum attached to the Loan Amendment Letter as Attachment II, into the current version of the Environmental & Social SafeguardFramework (ESSF), and publicly re-disclose the so revised ESSF version by no later than three (3) months as of thecountersignatureof this letter of amendment | Due Date :19-May-2014

title.narrative: % of sub-projects under Take Out that benefit from at least 50 basis points cost efficiency
Number of IIFCL person-days participated in training and capacity-building events.
(i) Number of eligible infrastructure projects that receive Bank funding support through IIFCL
Cumulative amount of Take-Out financing provided by IIFCL (US$m).
Total size of sub-projects (project costs) supported by IIFCL under the Project (US$m).
% of the loan disbursed through IIFCL to selected infrastructure sub-projects
Size of IIFCL’s safeguards team (regular staff)
Increase in the amount of private capital available for infrastructure projects (US$ bn)
Implementation of HR strategy and policy manual

baseline.value: HR strategy and policy manual approved

target.value: HR strategy and policy manual fully implemented.

title.narrative: Implementation of Integrated Risk Management (IRM) system

target.value: IRM implementation plan beyond year 1 activities initiated

actual.value: IRM plan approved and is under implementatin phase and is likely to be completed in FY16.

title.narrative: IIFCL’s fiduciary management capacity is enhanced
Development and implementation of IPL business plan.
Safeguards approach for Take Out financing adopted and implemented by IIFCL

actual.value: Implemented with due diligence exercises completed for two takeout cases - one was a prior review followed by another which was ona post review basis.

title.narrative: Procurement approach adopted and implemented by IIFCL
IIFCL’s safeguards management capacity is enhanced

baseline.value: Sufficient only for Category B and C

actual.value: Sufficient only for Category B and C
